description: Privileged Service Account Role Assigned to User
rationale: Access to the Service Account User role (roles/iam.serviceAccountUser) or the Service Account Token Creator role (roles/iam.serviceAccountTokenCreator) should be restricted, as members granted one of these roles on a service account can use it to indirectly access all the resources to which the service account has access.
remediation: Configure data access control lists based on a user's need to know. Apply data access control lists, also known as access permissions, to local and remote file systems, databases, and applications.
